Html:
3 questions, actually.

  1. Where does the Group Name come from? - I don't see a group name in my managed metadata service Term Store Management Tool
  2. do you know why, after 'Done Importing *.csv, I see nothing in my managed metadataservice Term Store Management Tool?
  3. Lastly, am I supposted to use the site itself, or the central admin url?
﻿

1. Group name is the name of the taxonomy group that you want to import/export to.

2. no i dont :)

3. You can use any url of a sharepoint site. API will figure out where to go for your taxonomy.

Thanks for using my app!
